resources.string:
• Do you have multiple Grace Internet radios? Change the name of any radio by entering into the radio’s ‘settings’ menu then select ‘UPnP’ then ‘Device Name’. After changing your radio’s name please restart your radio and this app.

 • This app is optimized for Grace Internet radios with service packs starting with ‘V26’. Radios with service packs starting with ‘V25’ please use the original Grace iPhone app. To check your service pack on your radio select ‘settings’ then select ‘version’ or ‘properties’.

 • No Radios Found: Make sure your phone uses the same Wi-Fi network as your Grace Internet radio(s)

 • Other issues or comments please contact: www.gracesupport.com
